Hey @zomato instead of pushing your hapless delivery partners into 10 minute orders while so many of them struggle on cycles in the heat, maybe at least streamline systems enough for normally timed deliveries . Every time I’ve used you past few weeks massive delays, poor response

urgent attention🚨

@zomato @zomatocare 

I wouldn't want call to you this but you are an "exploiter"

From not paying the delivery executive enough, promoting bizzare and menacing strategy like "10 minutes delivery" to ignoring the health and care of delivery executive.
